title: Election News: Peru Picks President and AMLO Has Midterms
content:
1. Election News: Peru Picks President and AMLO Has Midterms  Bloomberg
  2. Peru election: Country on edge ahead of unpredictable run-off  BBC News
  3. Peruvian voters face choice between 2 polarizing populists  The Associated Press
  4. Peru: How will Peruvians decide their future?  TeleSUR English
  5. Ipsos poll shows tie on eve of Peru's election, with Fujimori slightly ahead  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 選挙のニュース。ペルーは大統領を選び、AMLOは中間選挙に臨む
选举新闻。秘鲁选出总统，AMLO拥有中期选举权
